let’s return to Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":253274,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人バボラ、楽勝な敵だったが、俺様だから楽勝なのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Babora was an easy enemy, but that’s because I’m me—it was an easy win."},{"lineNumber":253275,"originalJapaneseLine":"普通の人間には為し得ない魔人撃破、また撃破スコアを伸ばしてしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeating demons impossible for ordinary humans, I’ve increased my defeat score again."},{"lineNumber":253276,"originalJapaneseLine":"すごい、俺","translatedEnglishLine":"Amazing, me."},{"lineNumber":253277,"originalJapaneseLine":"城に戻ったらセックスだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"When I get back to the castle, it’s time for sex."},{"lineNumber":253278,"originalJapaneseLine":"？？","translatedEnglishLine":"??"},{"lineNumber":253279,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人を撃破したら２０セックスはしてお祝いするのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"After defeating a demon, I celebrate by having sex twenty times."},{"lineNumber":253280,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞クエストクリア","translatedEnglishLine":"> Quest Clear"},{"lineNumber":253281,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマンに来ているもう一人の魔人は・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The other demon who has come to Helman is..."},{"lineNumber":253282,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクです、西部方面に展開している魔軍のどこかにいるはず","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s Kesselink. He should be somewhere in the demon army deployed in the western area."},{"lineNumber":253283,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、今は表立って動いていないので場所は分からない。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, he is not openly days later, thanks to Freya’s information, we discovered Kesselink’s location."},{"lineNumber":253288,"originalJapaneseLine":"トランシルバニアの森","translatedEnglishLine":"The Transylvania Forest."},{"lineNumber":253289,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は、トランシルバニアの森に来た、今から森に入ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others have arrived at the Transylvania Forest, and are about to enter it."},{"lineNumber":253290,"originalJapaneseLine":"昼間です。","translatedEnglishLine":"It is daytime."},{"lineNumber":253291,"originalJapaneseLine":"森の途中の会話、昼間","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation Kesselink."},{"lineNumber":253293,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが今の時間に進んでいる理由","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason Rance is moving forward at this time."},{"lineNumber":253294,"originalJapaneseLine":"奴が昼が弱いという事を知って昼に向かっているのだと","translatedEnglishLine":"He knows that he is weak during the day, so they are heading there now."},{"lineNumber":253295,"originalJapaneseLine":"自信まんまんのランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, full of confidence."},{"lineNumber":253296,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t屋敷に到着した時にはすっかり夜","translatedEnglishLine":"By the time we reached the mansion, it was completely night."},{"lineNumber":253297,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケッセルリンクが現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Kesselink appeared."},{"lineNumber":253298,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":253299,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケッセルリンクを倒し","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeated the demon soul."},{"lineNumber":253301,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t現れた使徒メイド達を脅して捕まえる","translatedEnglishLine":"Threatened and captured the appearing apostle maids."},{"lineNumber":253302,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、魔軍司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at the demon army’s command spreads,"},{"lineNumber":253304,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t大混乱に陥る","translatedEnglishLine":"causing great chaos."},{"lineNumber":253305,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマンに攻め込んだ魔軍の様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The state of the demon forces that attacked Helman."},{"lineNumber":253306,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物大将軍ルメイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster General Rumei."},{"lineNumber":253307,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケッセルリンクとメイド達","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Kesselink and the maids."},{"lineNumber":253308,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラによる魔人ケッセルリンクの説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella’s explanation about demon Kesselink."},{"lineNumber":253309,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人四天王で強い","translatedEnglishLine":"One of the Four Heavenly Kings of the demons, very strong."},{"lineNumber":253310,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦うなら昼にしろ","translatedEnglishLine":"If you fight him, do it during the day."},{"lineNumber":253311,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信がちょっとそわそわしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin is feeling a little restless."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンク様にご用心をと連絡をしておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Send a warning to Lord Kesselink to be cautious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛行魔物兵により火炎爆撃作戦の準備も整った。かならずや人間どもを全て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying monster soldiers have prepared the firebombing operation. We will surely

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テンプラにしてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: turn all the humans into tempura.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後に敵はまだまだ強いという感じを見せつつ　おわり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, showing that the enemy is still very strong — End.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶバボラの足を潰した後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After severely crippling Babora's legs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん・・みんな離れろ、倒れるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph... Everyone, step back, he’s about to fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラがぐらぐらとゆれてバターンと倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora swayed unsteadily and then crashed down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、止めだ。頭をぶっつぶせ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, finish him. Crush his head!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを倒した、この周辺の魔軍はそれを見てあわてて逃げ去った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having defeated Babora, the demon army nearby saw this and hurriedly fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、ヒューバートとクリームに伝えてやれ、今が迫撃のチャンスだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good, inform Hubert and Cream. Now is the chance to launch a close-range attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、魔人バボラがあっけなく死んだ事で動揺した魔軍をヘルマン軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterward, the Helman forces struck fiercely at the demon army unsettled by Babora’s sudden death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 猛撃を加え大ダメージを与え、領地を大きく回復した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dealing heavy damage and greatly recovering their territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを撃破した後、ラングバウに戻ったランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After defeating Babora, Rance and the others returned to Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒューバート、シーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hubert, Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やったなとヒューバートが握手をもとめたりするがスルーとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hubert tries to shake hands saying ‘We did it,’ but is ignored or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様強すぎてあっけなかったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m just too strong, it was over too quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間も余裕あるが、さて・・どうするかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s still plenty of time, but hmm... what should I do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　シーラと遊んだ後、ランス城に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Play with Sheila, then return to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　このまま連続で魔人を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Continue defeating demons consecutively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道、ランス達は帰還の途であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the highway, Rance and his party were on their way back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大活躍で疲れたから、ランス城に戻るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m tired from all the action; let’s return to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラ、楽勝な敵だったが、俺様だから楽勝なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Babora was an easy enemy, but that’s because I’m me—it was an easy win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の人間には為し得ない魔人撃破、また撃破スコアを伸ばしてしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeating demons impossible for ordinary humans, I’ve increased my defeat score again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい、俺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amazing, me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城に戻ったらセックスだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I get back to the castle, it’s time for sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を撃破したら２０セックスはしてお祝いするのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After defeating a demon, I celebrate by having sex twenty times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞クエストクリア
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Quest Clear

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに来ているもう一人の魔人は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other demon who has come to Helman is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクです、西部方面に展開している魔軍のどこかにいるはず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s Kesselink. He should be somewhere in the demon army deployed in the western area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、今は表立って動いていないので場所は分からない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, he is not openly active at the moment, so his location is unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついでに倒してやるから、見つけ出せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll take him down along the way, so find him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで俺はここでシーラと作戦会議をしているから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, I’ll be here holding strategy meetings with Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日後、フレイアの情報でケッセルリンクが居場所が分かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few days later, thanks to Freya’s information, we discovered Kesselink’s location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Transylvania Forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、トランシルバニアの森に来た、今から森に入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others have arrived at the Transylvania Forest, and are about to enter it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is daytime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 森の途中の会話、昼間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation midway through the forest, daytime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがケッセルリンクについての説明、ダイジェスト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella gives a summary explanation about Kesselink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが今の時間に進んでいる理由
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason Rance is moving forward at this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴が昼が弱いという事を知って昼に向かっているのだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He knows that he is weak during the day, so they are heading there now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自信まんまんのランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, full of confidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 屋敷に到着した時にはすっかり夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time we reached the mansion, it was completely night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクが現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Kesselink appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクを倒し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the demon Kesselink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂を手に入れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Obtained the demon’s blood soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れた使徒メイド達を脅して捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Threatened and captured the appearing apostle maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the demon army’s command center.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクの敗北が伝わり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Word of demon Kesselink’s defeat spreads,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大混乱に陥る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing great chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに攻め込んだ魔軍の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The state of the demon forces that attacked Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Rumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクとメイド達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Kesselink and the maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによる魔人ケッセルリンクの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella’s explanation about demon Kesselink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人四天王で強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One of the Four Heavenly Kings of the demons, very strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うなら昼にしろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you fight him, do it during the day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信がちょっとそわそわしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin is feeling a little restless.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンク様にご用心をと連絡をしておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Send a warning to Lord Kesselink to be cautious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛行魔物兵により火炎爆撃作戦の準備も整った。かならずや人間どもを全て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying monster soldiers have prepared the firebombing operation. We will surely

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テンプラにしてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: turn all the humans into tempura.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後に敵はまだまだ強いという感じを見せつつ　おわり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, showing that the enemy is still very strong — End.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいぶバボラの足を潰した後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After severely crippling Babora's legs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん・・みんな離れろ、倒れるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph... Everyone, step back, he’s about to fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラがぐらぐらとゆれてバターンと倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora swayed unsteadily and then crashed down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、止めだ。頭をぶっつぶせ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, finish him. Crush his head!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを倒した、この周辺の魔軍はそれを見てあわてて逃げ去った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having defeated Babora, the demon army nearby saw this and hurriedly fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、ヒューバートとクリームに伝えてやれ、今が迫撃のチャンスだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good, inform Hubert and Cream. Now is the chance to launch a close-range attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、魔人バボラがあっけなく死んだ事で動揺した魔軍をヘルマン軍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterward, the Helman forces struck fiercely at the demon army unsettled by Babora’s sudden death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 猛撃を加え大ダメージを与え、領地を大きく回復した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dealing heavy damage and greatly recovering their territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを撃破した後、ラングバウに戻ったランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After defeating Babora, Rance and the others returned to Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒューバート、シーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hubert, Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やったなとヒューバートが握手をもとめたりするがスルーとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hubert tries to shake hands saying ‘We did it,’ but is ignored or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様強すぎてあっけなかったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m just too strong, it was over too quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間も余裕あるが、さて・・どうするかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s still plenty of time, but hmm... what should I do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　シーラと遊んだ後、ランス城に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Play with Sheila, then return to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　このまま連続で魔人を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Continue defeating demons consecutively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道、ランス達は帰還の途であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the highway, Rance and his party were on their way back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大活躍で疲れたから、ランス城に戻るぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m tired from all the action; let’s return to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラ、楽勝な敵だったが、俺様だから楽勝なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Babora was an easy enemy, but that’s because I’m me—it was an easy win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の人間には為し得ない魔人撃破、また撃破スコアを伸ばしてしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeating demons impossible for ordinary humans, I’ve increased my defeat score again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい、俺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amazing, me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城に戻ったらセックスだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I get back to the castle, it’s time for sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を撃破したら２０セックスはしてお祝いするのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After defeating a demon, I celebrate by having sex twenty times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞クエストクリア
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Quest Clear

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに来ているもう一人の魔人は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other demon who has come to Helman is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクです、西部方面に展開している魔軍のどこかにいるはず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s Kesselink. He should be somewhere in the demon army deployed in the western area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、今は表立って動いていないので場所は分からない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, he is not openly active at the moment, so his location is unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついでに倒してやるから、見つけ出せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll take him down along the way, so find him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで俺はここでシーラと作戦会議をしているから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, I’ll be here holding strategy meetings with Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日後、フレイアの情報でケッセルリンクが居場所が分かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few days later, thanks to Freya’s information, we discovered Kesselink’s location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Transylvania Forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、トランシルバニアの森に来た、今から森に入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others have arrived at the Transylvania Forest, and are about to enter it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is daytime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 森の途中の会話、昼間
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation midway through the forest, daytime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがケッセルリンクについての説明、ダイジェスト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella gives a summary explanation about Kesselink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが今の時間に進んでいる理由
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason Rance is moving forward at this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴が昼が弱いという事を知って昼に向かっているのだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He knows that he is weak during the day, so they are heading there now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自信まんまんのランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, full of confidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 屋敷に到着した時にはすっかり夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time we reached the mansion, it was completely night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクが現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Kesselink appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクを倒し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the demon Kesselink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂を手に入れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Obtained the demon’s blood soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れた使徒メイド達を脅して捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Threatened and captured the appearing apostle maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the demon army’s command center.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクの敗北が伝わり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Word of demon Kesselink’s defeat spreads,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大混乱に陥る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing great chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンに攻め込んだ魔軍の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The state of the demon forces that attacked Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Rumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクとメイド達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Kesselink and the maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラによる魔人ケッセルリンクの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella’s explanation about demon Kesselink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人四天王で強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One of the Four Heavenly Kings of the demons, very strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うなら昼にしろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you fight him, do it during the day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信がちょっとそわそわしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin is feeling a little restless.
